title: Customer Satisfaction Survey for EV Charger Provider
description: We appreciate your feedback! Please take a few minutes to answer the following questions.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with our service?
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's satisfaction by looking at the 'TotalCost' column, which reflects the cost incurred during each session. If the total cost is low, it may indicate that the customer is satisfied with the service.

questions.question: Which of the following charging behaviors do you exhibit most frequently?
options: I don't charge my vehicle at this location
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's charging behavior by looking at the 'transaction_start' column and identifying peak and off-peak hours. This will help us understand when customers are most likely to charge their vehicles.

questions.question: Rate your preferred time for charging:

labels.5: I don't have a preferred time

questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's preferred charging time by looking at the 'transaction_start' column and identifying patterns in when customers charge their vehicles.

questions.question: What is your preferred unplug time?
questions.placeholder: Please specify a specific time or range of times
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's preferred unplug time by looking at the 'transaction_end' column and identifying patterns in when customers stop charging their vehicles.

questions.question: How often do you use our EV charger?
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's usage frequency by looking at the 'transaction_start' column and identifying patterns in when customers charge their vehicles.

questions.question: Rate your satisfaction with the charging speed:
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's satisfaction with charging speed by looking at the 'PowerkW' column and identifying patterns in when customers charge their vehicles.

questions.question: What is your preferred method of payment for EV charging?
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's preferred method of payment by looking at the 'PricingScheduleId' column and identifying patterns in when customers charge their vehicles.

questions.question: Do you have any suggestions for improving our EV charging service?
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze customer suggestions by looking at the 'StopTransactionReason' column and identifying patterns in when customers stop charging their vehicles.
